item.title: >Coding For Kids in Charlottesville
item.description: Computing At Blue Ridge Boost, we teach computing using play, starting with robots to visualize the programming concepts. The programming exercises use an attractive graphical interface to reinforce concepts through practice. We believe that students have to be exposed to the same programming concepts in a variety of situations and language variations. For this reason, students learn a few block languages to program WeDo Lego robots, mBot robots, help a beaver build its house in the Code Monkey framework.
